nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## Invite users to n8n from Google sheets
This workflow will get all Users from n8n and compare against the rows from Google sheets and create new users

Invitation emails will be sent once the new users created

You can run the workflow on demand or by schedule

## Spreadsheet template

The sheet columns are inspire from Squarespace newsletter block connection, but you can change the node to adapt new columns format

Clone the [sample sheet here]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}
- Submitted On	
- Email Address	
- Name

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Manualtrigger Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Manualtrigger Workflow. This workflow integrates 9 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, code, scheduleTrigger, merge. It contains 16 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 16
- **Node Types**: 9
- **Error Handling**: âœ… Implemented
- **Security**: âœ… Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: âœ… Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When clicking â€˜Test workflowâ€™**: manualTrigger
- **Get all Users**: httpRequest
- **Get all rows**: googleSheets
- **Get non-users**: merge
- **Invite Users**: httpRequest
- **Schedule Trigger**: scheduleTrigger
- **Edit Fields**: set
- **Sticky Note3**: stickyNote
- **Create users list**: set
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- ... and 6 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
